query:
query GetRecommendationBot($input: RecommendationBotInput!) {
  recommendationBot(input: $input) {
    id
    openPrice
    ticker
    date
    exchange
    latestPrice
    closedPrice
    tpPrice
    profit
    profitPercent
    quantity
    status
    openDate
    closedDate
    maxAllocation
    sector
  }
}
